params._implementation: SingleEditionMintable logic implementation contract to clone

params._animationHash: Metadata: SHA-256 Hash of the animation (if no animation url, can be 0x0)
params._animationUrl: Metadata: Animation url (optional) of the edition entry
params._description: Metadata: Description of the edition entry
params._editionSize: Total size of the edition (number of possible editions)
params._imageHash: Metadata: SHA-256 hash of the Image of the edition entry (if not image, can be 0x0)
params._imageUrl: Metadata: Image url (semi-required) of the edition entry

params.editionId: id of edition to get contract for

CreatedEdition(uint256,address,uint256,a.notice: Emitted when a edition is created reserving the corresponding token IDs.

constructor.notice: Initializes factory with address of implementation logic

createEdition(address,string,string,stri.notice: Creates a new edition contract as a factory with a deterministic address Important: None of these fields (except the Url fields with the same hash) can be changed after calling

getEditionAtId(uint256).notice: Get edition given the created ID

implementation().notice: Address for implementation of SingleEditionMintable to clone
